summary: 6 Ork Followers placed in Mor Khazgur.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This mod place many ork-follower to the fort mor khazgur in reach.
they have steelplate armor, steelswords and imperal bows.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update:
New uruks added!
They have now alll the Weapons and Armors equipped! 

1 Commander 
Weapons: Shield, Uruk-Hai Sword, Imperal Bow

1 Berserker 
Weapons: Uruk-Hai Sword

5 Warrior
Weapons uruk-Hai Sword, Imperal Bow

3 Hunter
Weapons: Imperal Bow
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:

1.Put the ESP your skyrim data folder.

!!!IMPORTANT!!!
This Mod are required!!!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For Unlimited Followers: Ultimate Follower Overhaul by Flokii:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037

steelplate armor texture replace by SXHarrasmentPanda:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=832

Uruk-Hai Helmet by Mandarinn:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5169

Uruk-Hai Sword by Mandarinn:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3247

Uruk-Hai Shield by Mandarinn:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3454
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: VanZerg
